description:
Lola begins shackled to a wall; her neck, wrists, and ankles held in place by hard steel. Her clothes are ripped from her body. her body is then turned to a bright color red as is falls under a heavy flogger. A vibe is placed between this little whore's legs, and then we see just how submissive she can be.
Next she finds herself in an arm sleeve with her arms pulled into a strappado. This time her fragile body is attacked with a very precise cane, leaving painful welts all over her. Again the vibe returns to keep this little whore where she needs to be.
She is finished on her back, with her legs and wrists pulled high. the cane is brought out again as well as the vibe, but this time the vibe is used to torment this little whore. She is taken the darkest edge she has ever experienced and left there to decide if she wants more.
title: Shackled Submissive
